messages.message: How should I think about Confidence scoring? Is there two types that we would use, one is the OCR scoring (the conversion of the image to text) for a particular area and the extraction confidence (a score on non-deterministic extractions)?

I think of it in 2 general categories:

What’s the OCR confidence on the page overall. [this will always be avaialble, especially once we move to IBDOC]

What’s the OCR confidence associated with this extraction [it’s there for standard functions, but for UDF’s its only available if the user has written an _v version of their normal Refiner function]
FYI @Aaron Vontell if he wants to provide any additional commentary
